title: Cafe Day
summary: A full day of Seoul cafe culture with pace, not pressure.
ideal_for: Solo travelers and couples who enjoy long conversations
flow: Morning in Bukchon, afternoon in Seongsu, evening in Hannam
highlight: Three distinct cafe moods in one day without rushing

title: Traditional
summary: Classic Seoul texture through palaces, hanok lanes, and tea.

flow: Gyeongbokgung, Bukchon walk, Insadong tea and crafts
highlight: Strong cultural context without feeling tourist-heavy

title: Night Seoul
summary: An after-dark route with skyline, food, and creative streets.
flow: Sunset at Namsan area, dinner in Euljiro, late walk in Hongdae
highlight: Balanced energy from scenic to social
